name: 2.0.1.Final
body:
- [**Bug**] Skip maven deploy for apicurio-registry-utils-exportV1 [#1577](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1577)
- [**Bug**] Redirect after deleting an artifact not working (MT only) [#1567](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1567)
- [**closed**] Image apicurio/apicurio-registry-streams:2.0.0.Final missing [#1561](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1561)
- [**Bug**][**Discussion**] ExtJsonConverter throws NPE for null schema/value [#1552](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1552)
- [**Bug**] Mismatch in ccompat mode in error_codes [#1547](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1547)
- [**Enhancement**] Investigate if it's possible to override Quarkus behaviour and disable http policies at runtime [#1542](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1542)
- [**Bug**] Field value limited at 1024 for top-level description. [#1534](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1534)
- [**closed**] Issues 1007 and 1017 are not yet fixed [#1530](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1530)
- [**closed**] Modularize Existing Monolithic Release Workflow [#1527](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1527)
- [**Enhancement**] Allow to disable security roles [#1523](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1523)
- [**Enhancement**] Create Bi-weekly job to run against Quarkus Latest Release [#1518](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1518)
- [**Discussion**][**Enhancement**] [question] disable direct access to API when multitenancy is enabled? [#1514](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1514)
- [**Enhancement**] Import on registry startup [#1502](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1502)
- [**closed**] Registration of schemas with same artifactId and different groupId causes error in api [#1501](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1501)
- [**closed**] Importing schemas from kafka after container restart crashes on "SELECT nextval('globalidsequence')" [#1500](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1500)
- [**closed**] Schema registry not working as expected when using confluent kafka python [#1491](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1491)
- [**Bug**] Custom versions not being handled well in the UI [#1489](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1489)
- [**Documentation**][**Question**] Problems running behind https [#1485](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1485)
- [**Enhancement**][**Impacts Documentation**] Create rest client based on vert.x web client [#1481](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1481)
- [**Enhancement**] Create spi for rest client implementations [#1480](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1480)
- [**Bug**] Wrong detection of magic byte during avro deserialization when the first field is empty [#1479](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1479)
- [**Bug**] Why limit "getArtifactVersionMetaDataByContent" request bodies to application/json? [#1476](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1476)
- [**closed**] Request: Support in python ? [#1475](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1475)
- [**closed**] Dependabot couldn't find a pom.xml for this project [#1471](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1471)
- [**Bug**] Fix workflow for building CLI images [#1458](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1458)
- [**closed**] serde security properties issues [#1455](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1455)
- [**Question**] Data serialized by AvroKafkaSerializer can't be deserialized by another Avro library [#1451](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1451)
- [**Duplicate**] Ccompat API should accept both application/vnd.schemaregistry.v1+json and application/json [#1449](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1449)
- [**closed**] JSON schema compatibility rule bug: no change but neither forward nor backward compatible  [#1443](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1443)
- [**Bug**] Error loading Registry UI on https [#1442](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1442)
- [**closed**] Maven plugin call ends with ssl exception [#1418](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1418)
- [**closed**] JSON compatibility check for schemaDependencies - Object [#1406](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1406)
- [**closed**] Question about registry versioning [#1398](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1398)
- [**closed**] JSON compatibility check for object [#1395](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1395)
- [**closed**] A Strange ClassName Resouce [#1393](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1393)
- [**Bug**] JSON compatibility check for combined schema [#1367](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1367)
- [**Question**] Integration with Keycloak [#1353](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1353)
- [**Bug**] JSON compatibility check for tuple [#1347](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1347)
- [**Task**] Upgrade process from previous versions to 2.x [#1339](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1339)
- [**Bug**] JSON compatibility check for exclusive maximum/minimum [#1318](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1318)
- [**Question**] apicurio registry security in 2.x release [#1244](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1244)
- [**Task**][**mas**] Evaluate building a native image [#1068](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1068)
- [**2.0.x**][**Enhancement**][**UI**] UI - improve experience uploading artifact to slow storage [#614](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/614)
- [**closed**] Downloading / Publishing YAML removes quotes from strings [#1447](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1447)
